price: Ameziumba mbingu na ardhi kwa haki, na akakupeni sura, na akazifanya nzuri sura zenu. Na marudio ni kwake.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu ameziumba mbingu na ardhi kwa hikima isiyo na ukomo, na akakuumbeni kwa sura, na akazifanya nzuri sura zenu, kwa kuwa amewafanya wanaadamu ndio viumbe walio nyooka vizuri. Na kwake Yeye ndiyo marejeo Siku ya Kiyama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi waṣawwarakum fa-aḥsana ṣuwarakum wa-ilayhi al-maṣīru
